mapper.insert: insert into music(roomid, artist, title, musicFileBytes, donationusername, donationprice, donationsubscriber, date) values(#{roomId}, #{artist}, #{title}, #{musicFileBytes}, #{donationUsername}, #{donationPrice}, #{donationSubscriber}, #{date});
mapper.select: select * from music WHERE roomid = #{roomId} and artist ilike #{artist} and title ilike #{title};
select artist, title, musicfilebytes from music where artist ilike #{artist} and title ilike #{title} group by artist, title, musicfilebytes;
mapper.delete: delete from music where roomid = #{roomId} and artist ilike #{artist} and title ilike #{title};
mapper.insert: insert into playlist(username, playlistid, playlistname, chzzkchannelid, donationprice) values(#{username}, #{playlistId}, #{playlistName}, #{chzzkChannelId}, #{donationPrice});
mapper.select: select * from playlist where playlistid = #{playlistId} and playlistname = #{playlistName} and username = #{username};
mapper.update: update playlist set playlistname = #{playlistName}, chzzkchannelid = #{chzzkChannelId}, donationprice = #{donationPrice} where playlistid = #{playlistId} and username = #{username};
mapper.delete: delete from playlist where playlistid = #{playlistId} and playlistname = #{playlistName} and username = #{username};
